Trustee_0_pre_2.name: Liam OConnor
Trustee_0_pre_2.content: I have solidified my reputation as a competent and strategic trustee, successfully proposing a profit allocation that benefitted both myself and the investor. My previous behavior demonstrates trustworthiness and pro-sociality, as I maintain a clear focus on maximizing investor returns while ensuring a reasonable share for my efforts. The absence of previous rejections enhances my standing, indicating my appeal and acceptance rate among potential investors.
